/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/sweep.dir/sweep.cpp.o  -o sweep  -L/usr/local/include/hidapi  -L/opt/local/lib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/include/hidapi -Wl,-rpath,/opt/local/lib /opt/local/lib/libuhd.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_program_options-mt.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_system-mt.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_filesystem-mt.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_thread-mt.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_chrono-mt.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_date_time-mt.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_atomic-mt.dylib /usr/local/lib/libhidapi.dylib
